answerText: Java[10] Java utilizes one of these systems to compile source code into intermediate bytecode. In java, this system which executes Java bytecode and allows Java to be a "write once, run anywhere" language.

subject: Science
question: Question: The Swing API in this language allows for the easy creation of a GUI and is an implementation of the widget system from this language's Abstract Window Toolkit libraries. For 10 points each: [10] Name this ubiquitous object-oriented programming language which was developed by James Gosling for Sun Microsystems.
